author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Health and Family Welfare Department will be organising a total of 2,108 special medical camps across the State between February 21 and 29 to mark the 68th birthday of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

An official release quoting Health Minister C. Vijayabhaskar said that 680 special childcare camps and another 680 general medical camps would be conducted.

A total of 680 general and special medical camps would be held by recognised hospitals and 68 special medical camps on behalf of medical college hospitals would be organised.

Medicines would be issued free of cost to participants who attend these camps for check-ups, the press release said.
title: Special medical camps from today
